settings.title: Options
settings.exportAppTitle: Download a self-contained static web application

searchTooltip.title: Search and Tooltip (optional)
searchTooltip.description: The selected column, if any, will be used for full-text search and tooltips. Choose a column with freeform text, such as a description, chat messages, or a summary.

embeddingView.title: Embedding View (optional)
embeddingView.description: To enable the embedding view, you can either (a) pick a pair of pre-computed X and Y columns; or (b) pick a text column and compute the embedding projection in browser. For large data, it's recommended to pre-compute the embedding and its 2D projection.
embeddingView.neighborsHelp: Neighbors column should contain pre-computed nearest neighbors in format: { "ids": [n1, n2, ...], "distances": [d1, d2, ...] }. IDs should be zero-based row indices.
embeddingView.computeHelp: Computing the embedding and 2D projection in browser may take a while. The model will be loaded with Transformers.js.

fileUpload.dragDrop: Drag & drop files here or click to select
fileUpload.acceptedTypes: Accepted file types: JSON, CSV, Parquet

descriptions.countPlot: Create a count plot of a field
descriptions.histogram: Create a histogram of a field
descriptions.lineChart: Create a line chart of two fields
descriptions.ecdf: Create a chart showing the empirical cumulative distribution (eCDF) of a field
descriptions.heatmap: Create a 2D heatmap of two fields
descriptions.sqlPredicates: Create a filter with custom SQL predicates
descriptions.markdown: Create a view with markdown content
descriptions.contentViewer: Create a view that displays a given field's content for the last selected point
descriptions.customSpec: Create a chart with custom spec

statusBar.marqueeSelection: Toggle rectangle selection mode. In normal mode, use shift + drag for rectangle selection.
statusBar.lassoSelection: Toggle lasso selection mode. In normal mode, use shift + meta + drag for lasso selection.
